pkgmetadata.longdescription: # djangorestframework-types [![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/djangorestframework-types.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/djangorestframework-types/)Type stubs for [Django Rest Framework](https://www.django-rest-framework.org).> Note: this project was forked from> <https://github.com/typeddjango/djangorestframework-stubs> with the goal of> removing the [`mypy`](https://github.com/python/mypy) plugin dependency so> that `mypy` can't [crash due to Django> config](https://github.com/typeddjango/django-stubs/issues/318), and that> non-`mypy` type checkers like> [`pyright`](https://github.com/microsoft/pyright) will work better with> Django Rest Framework.## install```bashpip install djangorestframework-types```## related- <https://github.com/sbdchd/django-types>- <https://github.com/sbdchd/celery-types>- <https://github.com/sbdchd/mongo-types>- <https://github.com/sbdchd/msgpack-types>
